person.persName: John Wyatt Leathers, Jr. (Kenton County state representative and farmer)

body.p: Residence: District 1 (Fowlers Creek post office), Kenton County, KY. Born, lived and died on his homestead on the Lexington Pike in Kenton County. Elected twice to the lower House of the KY Legislature, a Democrat representing Kenton County. Elected for one term representing Campbell and Kenton counties in the KY Senate. Also director of the Covington & Lexington Turnpike Company for many years. Son of John White Leathers and Jane Stark. Married Elizabeth Kirtley.
